subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobile Racing
Talladega Superspeedway
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar said it will study several safety standards, including the height of the fences surrounding the track, after a last-lap accident that sent debris flying into the grandstands at Talladega Superspeedway in Charlotte, N.C.
snippet: Nascar said it will study several safety standards, including the height of the fences surrounding the track, after a last-lap accident that sent debris flying into the grandstands at Talladega Superspeedway in Charlotte, N.C.
